monster.name: Ambush Drake
monster.languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The drake has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the drake's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
trait.text: If the drake surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Special Equipment
trait.text: Azbara has two scrolls of mage armor.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: When Azbara casts an evocation cantrip and misses, or the target succeeds on its saving throw, the target stil takes half the cantrip's damage but suffers no other effect.

trait.name: Sculpt Spells
trait.text: When Azbara cast an evocation spell that affects other creatures that he can see, he can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell's level to succeed on their saving throws against the spell. Those creatures take no damage if they would normally take half damage from the spell.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Azarba is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Azbara has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, misty step, scorching ray
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, fireball

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: Blagothkus has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Blagothkus can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:
3/day each: fog cloud, levitate

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Blagothkus is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Blagothkus has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, prestidigitation
1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, magic missile, shield
2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, misty step, shatter
3rd level (2 slots): fly, lightningbolt

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Blagothkus attacks twice with his morningstar.

action.name: Morningstar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges when Othelstan Finishes a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: On his turn, Othelstan can take one additional action.

trait.name: Tiamat's Blessing of Retribution
trait.text: When Othelstan takes damage that reduces him to 0 hit points, he immediately regains 20 hit points or fewer at the end of his next turn, he dies.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Othelstan attacks twice with his flail or spear, or makes two ranged attacks with his spears.

action.name: Flail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic

trait.name: Fanatical Advantage
trait.text: Once per turn, if the dragonclaw makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

trait.name: Pack Tatics
trait.text: The dragonclaw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonclaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragonclaw attacks twice with its scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.name: War Magic

action.name: Multiattack
